synopsis.text: Mima, Shiki, Ichikura, and Futami are four seemingly cool and aloof guys who effortlessly radiate an aura of suave sophistication. But don't be fooled by their outward appearances, for beneath the veneer of coolness lies a quartet of lovable goofballs who are prone to the most hilarious of faux pas. From forgetting their wallets to accidentally playing music out loud on the train, these clumsy charmers are masters of turning everyday situations into comedic gold. Despite their penchant for mishaps, the boys always manage to maintain their composure, adding an endearing layer of self-awareness to their antics. As you watch their daily exploits unfold, you'll find yourself laughing along with them, and maybe even falling for their unconventional charms. So sit back, grab some popcorn, and prepare to be entertained by these four clumsy dudes who never fail to keep their cool.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
